name: Shooter Fury
description:
This game is a submission to the Bullet Hell Game Jam

Shoot enemies, collect coins, and do more!

Programmers:

@fabd89, @Jamam150

Musicians:

@Jacob Hallberg

Controls:

Move - WASD

Dash - SPACE

Shoot - LMB

Look - MOUSE CURSOR

Pause - ESC

Hey! if you decide you play and like the game, then make sure that you also rate the game since it was a submission to the 3rd annual Bullet Hell Game Jam

*Note* The mouse cursor hotspot is still in the top left corner, so if you can't click small buttons in the middle of the cursor, then try using the top left.
